lines.text: You know what NAACP means, don't you?
You tell me what it means.
It means "Niggers Ain't Always Colored People"!
What did he mean by that?
He just called us niggers.
He did?

[being held at gunpoint by Marge]
I am the new landlord. And you are disregarding your lease by practicing whatever you're practicing here with these, with these readings. I'll have you thrown out! So if you want to shoot, just go ahead and shoot. That'll be running an illegal business, nonpayment of rent... and manslaughter.
He just called us niggers.
Us?
He thinks the Lord put white people on this earth as punishment. 'Course I don't hold with no sacrilegious talk like that.
If you didn't sweat so much, nobody'd take you for a landlord.
These arrows have been dipped in Fanny's barbecue sauce so as to make death slow and more agonizing to its unfortunate victims.
If you march into this house with an armful of pickaninnies from this business venture of yours, the best you'll be able to expect from me is a swift kick in the ass.
And you know that peace symbol you have hanging around your neck? Why don't you shove it up your ass!

[inspecting the tenement house]
In this area, I'm gonna hang a big chandelier.
I think I love a woman who is a Negro.
I think we should go for a little drive.
Joyce, you are a liberated butch american broad. 'Doesn't mean I don't love you.
What does it mean, dear?
It means I'm going to do what I want with my damn life.
If she's putting you on, she's most likely only Jewish.
Sit down and drink your wine before the ice cubes melt.
I'm going home, wherever that is.
Honey, you better sit yo'self down and have some lunch. How you white folks gonna defend yo'self if you don't eat?

[upon being poured some wine]
Is that carbonated?
It's just ruthless. It's ruthless.
It's pot likker, juice from the green. Lead in your pencil.
